|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = AMD;AM29F040B-90JC; |flash1size = 512 KiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 |ram1chip = Micron;MT4LC1M16E5-6V; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = AMD;Am79C961AKC; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 10MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:E0:03 |oui = 00:E0:03

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Nokia C021 |rad1modif = PCMCIA (16-bit) |rad1chip1cpu = <!-- true, --> |rad1chip1 = AMD;Am79C930VC; |rad1chip2 = Harris;HSP3824; |rad1chip3 = Harris;; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = SMA |rad1stand = legacy (DSSS)
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "WR-1200 (C) In-Talk.Inc 1997,1998" and "Assy 01-0001 Rev1.3 Part 14-0001 Rev1.3" (among other things) is silkscreened on the board used to populate this page.
Specifications of the C021 wireless module are per the poor quality FCC schematics for the [[Samsung SWL-1000N]]. It's another Am79C930+'''PRISM I''' RF variant. More information on the card can be seen [https://www.qsl.net/n9zia/wireless/appendixG.html here].
As expected for this era, the A021 came with a rather beefy manual.
===Power supply specifications=== {{hasPowerSupply |brand = Clairtronic |model = AM-121000 |revision = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |input_v=120 |input_a= |input_c=AC |input_hz=60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=1 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=large, vertical |e_level= |ul=E112794 }}
